name: Ca La Iaia
description: In "Ca la iaia" you play as a granddaughter who is trying to learn her grandma's recipes after finding the recipe book damaged. You might need to grow most of the ingredients for the recipes (onions, tomatos, garlics, potatoes,...) and sell a part of them in order to buy ingredients that you can't grow by yourself. You only have the names of the recipes, so you need to figure out which ingredients make each recipe.
